attributes.action: UK government to suspend all local council tax during the Covid19 crisis
attributes.additional_details: UK government to suspend all local council tax during the Covid19 crisis to give UK nationals some financial relief during this unprecedented time. UK government to make up the shortfall to local councils budgets by accessing emergency funding aid and providing this too local councils.
attributes.background: UK government to suspend all local council tax during the Covid19 crisis to give UK nationals some financial relief during this unprecedented time.
